content.rendered:
Directed by Pamela Fryman. Anthony Rich. Mark Cendrowski. Leonard R. Garner Jr.. Kelly Park.

Written by Dan Rubin. Dan Rubin. Reinhold Weege. Rebecca Delgado Smith. Rebecca Delgado Smith. Jessica Elaina Eason. Jessica Elaina Eason. Shawn Parikh. Bennett Webber. Lon Zimmet. Caroline Fox. Mathew Harawitz. Azie Mira Dungey. Leila Strachan. Julianne Turkel.

Cast India de Beaufort (Olivia 1). Lacretta (Donna ‘Gurgs’ Gurganous). John Larroquette (Dan Fielding 1). Kapil Talwalkar (Neil 1). Dimiter D. Marinov (Nikolai). Lisa Costanza (Carol). Al Bayan (Blaine). Wendie Malick (Julianne). Stephnie Weir (Remecca). Faith Ford (Gina). Gary Anthony Williams (Judge Flobert). Antonio Raul Corbo (Carlos). Brian Scolaro (Arnold). Danny Araujo (Vincent). Iris Bahr (Esmerelda). Kimia Behpoornia (Maggie). Gabe Fonseca (Audio Engineer). David Douglas (Delivery Guy). Pam Murphy (Pam). Garrett Bales (Nate Crabbe). Cosette Hauer (Claire). Maria Pallas (Lesley). Tara Lipinski (Tara Lipinski). Jecobi Swain (Xavier). Marypat Farrell (Helen). Will Hines (Lawyer). Jill Basey (Marsha). Brendan Jennings (Howie). Aaron Coleman (Father Manny). Kenneth Mosley (Devin). Sarah Buehler (Missy). Kayden Alexander Koshelev (Max). Johnny Weir (Johnny Weir).

Language English.

Producers Mona Garcea. Dan Rubin. Pixie Wespiser. Pamela Fryman. Tony Hicks. Amy Janon. John Larroquette. Mark Maitlen. Suzy Mamann-Greenberg. Melissa Rauch. Winston Rauch. Reid Watanabe.

Production After January Productions. Secret Bird. Universal Television.

Creators Dan Rubin. Reinhold Weege.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 12

Status OnGoing (2023–)
